alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Grainger; Hancock (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 9:04AM CST until February 26 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Morristown TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee... Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Grainger, Hancock and Claiborne Counties. For the Clinch River...including Tazewell TN...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clinch River above Tazewell TN. * WHEN...From this evening to late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flooding of pasture land near Grissom Island begins. The city of Tazewell, Tennessee is not affected by flooding of the Clinch River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 13.0 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 115 AM EST.
